original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Royal Express Boat Cruise
overview: Phnom Penh is the starting point for a special journey through Cambodia, an exotic land that is gradually transforming itself from a traditional way of life into modern times. The boat cruise on the Royal Express is the perfect way to view Cambodia's scenery & to experience age old traditions & lifestyle of a land that is slowly saying farewell to its tragic past.
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Royal Express Boat Cruise
